name: TRIWEST HEALTHCARE ALLIANCE CORP
sampleDescriptions: Lobbying related to the Department of Veterans Affairs Community Care program.
Lobbying related to the Department of Veterans Affairs Community Care program.
Department of Veterans Affairs Community Care Program contract
Provided staff with information on the Department of Veterans Affairs Community Care Program and clients work with the VA to ensure veterans are provided care outside of VA facilities.
